title: gourmet gouda, avocado, pesto grilled cheese
directions: Prepare the avocado and cheese by slicing. Butter one side of 8 slices of bread. Place bread butter side down and spread with 1 TBS pesto, then layer the gouda, avocado and spinach on top. Place the other slice of bread butter side up. Repeat with the other three sandwiches. Heat a fry man over med. heat. Place two sandwiches in the pan and cook for 3-5 min or until browned. Flip and repeat on the other side. Remove and cook the other two sandwiches. Serve hot with your favorite sandwich sides.
